name: Car Driving School Academy 18
description:
In this game you will start as a beginner or a learner car driver for car driving license test games and follow the simple car driving school games rules of parking and car driving school games. So win all levels and unlock furious cars in latest driving school games simulator.

Features

- Exceptional driving school games platform for learners.
- Multiple car driving and parking missions
- Different vehicles to choose with driving school game 2018.
- Realistic Car Driving Physics and awesome graphics in driving school games 2019.
- Avoid collisions otherwise level will be failed in driving school simulator games.
